EStatus RoutingLookFor ( Routing *  pThis,
StationId  dstId,
StationId *  pTransitId 
)

Looks for a route to destination id

Parameters:
pThis [in] pointer to instance
dstId [in] destination station id
pTransitId [out] transit station id will be stored in *pTransitId
Returns:
eSTATUS_COMMON_OK if the route was found and *pTransit was filled with valid station id

eSTATUS_LIST_NOT_FOUND if the route was not found
